# leafleticon

__leafleticon__: create leafleticon data.
   
## AdminLTE CSS Color Code

+ info aqua: #00c0ef

+ danger red: #dd4b39

+ success green: #00a65a

+ warning yellow: #f39c12

+ primary steelblue: #337ab7

+ grey: #d2d6de

+ purple: #605ca8
